data.title: Tromsø Mountain Challenge – TMC Tindløpet – Tromsdalstinden opp
data.meta_description: The Tromsø Mountain Challenge is rounded off with a downhill race up the city mountain in Tromsø itself, Tromsdalstinden. "The Peak", as the mountain is called among the locals, is 1238 meters high, can be seen from the center of Tromsø and is a well-known and beautiful landmark in Tromsø., The race starts at TUIL Arena in Tromsdalen and finishes at the top of Tromsdalstinden. All participants must have a rucksack containing drinks, food, a dry shirt and a windbreaker. The lining in the rucksack is intended as a safety device, as there can be rough weather conditions at the finish line at the top of Tromsdalstinden. Note that there is no refreshment station at the top of the peak after the finish line, so participants must bring what they need themselves., The course records are 1:02:15 for men and 1:16:00 for women. The maximum time to reach the top is set at 3 hours. Everyone who completes the race receives a participant's prize and the top three in the women's and men's classes receive extra prizes. In addition, gift prizes will be drawn among all participants., The TMC Tindløpet is part of the triple in the Tromsø Mountain Challenge.
data.text:
Description

The Tromsø Mountain Challenge is rounded off with a downhill race up the city mountain in Tromsø itself, Tromsdalstinden. "The Peak", as the mountain is called among the locals, is 1238 meters high, can be seen from the center of Tromsø and is a well-known and beautiful landmark in Tromsø.

The race starts at TUIL Arena in Tromsdalen and finishes at the top of Tromsdalstinden. All participants must have a rucksack containing drinks, food, a dry shirt and a windbreaker. The lining in the rucksack is intended as a safety device, as there can be rough weather conditions at the finish line at the top of Tromsdalstinden. Note that there is no refreshment station at the top of the peak after the finish line, so participants must bring what they need themselves.

The course records are 1:02:15 for men and 1:16:00 for women. The maximum time to reach the top is set at 3 hours. Everyone who completes the race receives a participant's prize and the top three in the women's and men's classes receive extra prizes. In addition, gift prizes will be drawn among all participants.

The TMC Tindløpet is part of the triple in the Tromsø Mountain Challenge.
